com.solvvy.nlp

Class TaggedLemmaNgramIdfStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.solvvy.nlp.TaggedLemmaNgramIdfStore

  • public class TaggedLemmaNgramIdfStore
extends Object
    A store for IDF values of tagged-lemma n-grams. IDF values are computed in a two step procedure (which is controlled by some external object): 1) tagged-lemma n-gram hit counts are accumulated from some collection of items, 2) then they are transformed into IDF counts based on the total number of items. A tagged-lemma n-gram hit count is the number of items that contains a particular tagged-lemma n-gram, *not* the total number of times the tagged-lemma n-gram occurred.
    Author:
    jbetter
